versos: (attain) Philippians 3:12 - "Not that I have already obtained this or am already perfect, but I press on to make it my own, because Christ Jesus has made me his own.";;;
(breadth) Job 11:7 - Can you fathom the mysteries of God Can you probe the limits of the Almighty;;;
(ornament) Isaiah 3:20 - "the headdresses, the armlets, the sashes, the perfume boxes, and the amulets;";;;
(stumble) Psalm 37:24: "though he may stumble, he will not fall, for the Lord upholds him with his hand.";;;

(ravished) Song of Solomon 5:6 - "I opened to my beloved; but my beloved had withdrawn himself, and was gone: my soul failed when he spake: I sought him, but I could not find him; I called him, but he gave me no answer.";;;
(sluggard) Proverbs 6:6 - "Go to the ant, you sluggard; consider its ways and be wise";;;
(zion) Psalm 137:1 - "By the rivers of Babylon we sat and wept when we remembered zion.";;;
(getteth) Proverbs 21:17 - He that loveth pleasure shall be a poor man: he that loveth wine and oil shall not be rich.;;;
(soweth) Galatians 6:7 - "Be not deceived; God is not mocked: for whatsoever a man soweth, that shall he also reap.";;;
(decked) Psalm 45:13 - "The king's daughter is all glorious within: her clothing is of wrought gold.";;;
(goodman) Proverbs 12:2 - A good man obtaineth favour of the Lord: but a man of wicked devices will he condemn.;;;
(scorner) Proverbs 9:7 - "He that reproveth a scorner getteth to himself shame: and he that rebuketh a wicked man getteth himself a blot.";;;
(liberal) Proverbs 11:25 - A generous person will prosper; whoever refreshes others will be refreshed.;;
(sinner) Luke 7:37 - "A woman in that town who lived a sinful life learned that Jesus was eating at the Pharisees house, so she came there with an alabaster jar of perfume.";;;
(hasty) proverbs 19:2 - Desire without knowledge is not good
(feedeth) Psalm 23:1 - "The Lord is my shepherd; I shall not want. He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.";;;
(finish) John 19:30 - When he had received the drink, Jesus said, "It is finished." With that, he bowed his head and gave up his spirit.;;;
(housetop) Matthew 10:27 - "What I tell you in the dark, speak in the daylight; what is whispered in your ear, proclaim from the housetops.";;;
